name: Prettier
description: Prettier is an opinionated code formatter. It enforces a consistent style by parsing your code and re-printing it with its own rules that take the maximum line length into account, wrapping code when necessary.
benefits: Eliminates debates over style in code reviews
Ensures consistent formatting across the entire codebase
Supports many languages (JavaScript, TypeScript, CSS, HTML, etc.)
usage_notes: Often run as a pre-commit hook or on save in IDEs.
Works well in conjunction with linters like ESLint.
